Aurum Press. p.627.</ref> His competitor in the event, which consisted of a single bout of [[foil (sword)|foil]] fencing to three touches, was one of the best fencers in the world, the [[France|Frenchman]] [[Jean Maurice Perronet]]. After a close contest, Pyrgos won 3-1. The crowd cheered the first Greek Olympic medallist.
